definition: to be on the move/to roam or wander/to circulate (of goods or capital)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Contract after rent in the countryside la nd circulation practice blooming.
sentences.chinese: 反租倒包在农村土地流转的实践中脱颖而出。

sentences.english: This busy pace accompanies lots of cash flow.
sentences.chinese: 这种繁忙的节奏意味着现金流转量很大。

sentences.english: Even if does burning pond red simply streaming to rotate also hide not to live her pallor.
sentences.chinese: 纵使炎池红光流转，也遮不住她的苍白。

sentences.english: The minor property house problems reflect the land use right of the Circulation.
sentences.chinese: 小产权房问题最终反映的是宅基地使用权的流转问题。

sentences.english: Test flows in isolation without the container.
sentences.chinese: 脱离容器单独测试流转。

sentences.english: By chance or nature's changing course untrimmed.
sentences.chinese: 偶然的，或是随自然变化而流转。

sentences.english: Good and evil, light and darkness, and human values change over time.
sentences.chinese: 正义与邪恶，光明与黑暗，空名流转，人是物非。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the structure principle and debug method of the axial flow and grout rotation electrohydraulic speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 介绍轴流转浆式电液调速器的结构原理与调试方法。

sentences.english: Lijiang River takes wind flow is the essence of Guilin landscape.
sentences.chinese: 漓江依山流转蜿蜒，是桂林山水的精华。

sentences.english: A clear stream swishes its way around.
sentences.chinese: 一道清澈的溪流在周围沙沙地流转。

sentences.english: I'm clear as to why you call it turnover tax.
sentences.chinese: 我清楚为什么称它为流转税了。
弹吧，山姆，弹那首《时光流转》。

sentences.english: Prompt delivery would be nece ary as we have a fast turnover in this trade.
sentences.chinese: 即期交货很重要，因为这种货流转很快。

sentences.english: The company finally paid the turnover tax in arrears.
sentences.chinese: 这间公司终于补交了他们偷漏的流转税。

sentences.english: Because the universe as well as human life is changing non-stop all the time.
sentences.chinese: 因为宇宙大化，刻刻流转，绝不停留。

sentences.english: There previously mentioned three taxes are important in the turnover tax system.
sentences.chinese: 上述三个税种是流转税体系的重要组成部分。

definition: to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to work/to operate/to revolve/to turn around
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
to take in and send out (in large quantities)
to hold in store/to contain (untapped reserves etc)
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
to take in/to absorb/to admit/to accept
